Post-employment benefits

The Group’s subsidiaries recognised liabilities for post—employment benefits based on the actuarial calculation by an Independent Actuary.

The present value of the defined post—employment benefit obligations, and the related current service cost and past service cost, were measured using the projected unit credit method. No funding has been made to this defined benefit scheme.
